name: Arcade Claw
description:
**NEWS**
Arcade claw is on sale! 50% off for a limited time only!
********

Will the claw hold? Test your claw game skill! Try any of the four different crane machines, each with a dozen prizes. Earn credits to play for the mystery prizes!

Features:
- Authentic skill crane experience
- Real physics
- Beautiful 3D rendering
- Dozens of prizes
- Game Center leaderboard! Compete against your friends!
- Trophy room
- Multiple skill levels
- Different game modes
- Use the accelerometer to swing the claw toward the prizes
- Shake to push the machine but be careful not to 'tilt' it!!
- Authentic claw machine sounds and fun background music!

Gameplay Tips:
* Swipe left, right, or down to change the view
* Double tap to bring up the pause screen
* Swipe left or right to change machines
